name: Make Haste, Detective!
description:
Time to speedrun some detective work🔎! Make Haste, Detective! is a fully voice-acted narrative whodunnit game where you solve criminal case in under a minute! Every 10 seconds the suspect you’re interviewing changes! Best of luck, detective, clock’s ticking! 🕵️ Download now and let us know what you think!

Voice Acting, Writing:

Mr. Alias - https://www.youtube.com/c/MrAlias

Artwork:

Luko - https://www.artstation.com/luko3artist

Callax3D - https://www.artstation.com/callax3d

Programming:

Pie - https://bcmpinc.wordpress.com/

Artie! - https://frogwizardhat.itch.io/

Music:

ALYCAT - https://alyssavery.com
